paper_title.en: Visual perception of texture of textiles

description.en: The mechanism of visual texture perception was investigated by measuring visual evaluation values. Textile samples of different surface structures were examined, along with corresponding image samples rendered on paper. The relation between physical properties of textiles and light reflected from the textiles, and the relation between the reflected light stimulating the eyes of the subject and the psychological perception of texture are discussed. (C) 2001 John Wiley & Sons, Inc.

paper_title.ja: 染色布の紫外線遮蔽性能に関する研究(第1報) ―Direct Red 綿染色布について―
赤、黄、緑、青への白色量、黒色量の知覚的な加法性について
paper_title.en: Study on the Contenet of White or Black Added to Red, Yellow, Green, and Blue in Color Perception

description.ja: 赤、黄、緑、青への白色量および各色への黒色量の知覚的な加法性について、回転混色法により顕色される表面色(2色混色)の心理測定実験により検討した。回転混色により顕色される表面色は、円盤上に扇形に配置された色紙の中心角により、物理的に規定される。赤、黄、緑、青の各色に、比率を変化させた白または黒を混色し、各色に対する白色量、黒色量と規定した。実験1では、各色と白、各色と黒の2色混色系列に対する色み、白み、黒みの知覚量を被験者(12名)各自の心理原色を基準に測定し、白色量、黒色量に応じて、それぞれの知覚量がどのように変化するかを調べた。実験2では、同じ被験者により、同じ2色混色系列に対する色み、白み、黒みの知覚量および2色間の知覚的な混色比率を同時呈示された物理原色を基準に測定し、原色知覚における量尺度と比率尺度との関係を調べるとともに、色原色(赤、黄、緑、青)を基準とした場合に、混色がどの程度あかるい-くらい、こい-うすい、あざやかな-くすんだかを3形容詞対の7段階評定により測定し、白、黒の知覚と色調の変化との関係を調べた。その結果、色知覚における白色量の加法性と黒色量の加法性に、いくつかの差異が認められた。1.白は、色原色の性質を保ちながら加わっていくのに対し、黒は、色調を変化させながら加わっていく傾向を示した。2.白を加えた混色系列における色み量と白み量は、量尺度においても比率尺度的な判断が行われるのに対し、黒を加えた混色系列における色み量と黒み量は、量尺度において独立に判断される傾向を示した。3.白み加法性は、知覚色における量的な変化として成り立つのに対し、黒は、色調としての知覚に影響を及ぼしながら、独立に加わっていくことから、知覚色の質的な変化に大きく関与することが示唆された。
description.en: The purpose of this study is to investigate in two experiments how we perceive the additive color mixture appearance with the white content and the black content added to either one of four primary colors : red, yellow, green, and blue, using spinning disk method. The surface colors to be developed on the spinning disk were physically controlled by the central angles of each color laid out on the fan-shaped glossy paper. Further, the white content and the black content were determined by mixing various rations of white or black with each color : red, yellow, green, and blue. To examine the variations of each color in relation to the white content or black content, the first experiment asked twelve subjects to identify the quantitative perception of each color and the white content or the black content on the mixed color as compared with psychological criteria of primary colors. Further, the second experiment examined the interrelationship between the magnitued scale and the ratio scale. So, the same subjects were asked to perform the quantitative perception and the ratio perception of each color to the white content or to the black contet on the mixed color as compared with each color and white(or black)on the both sides. In addition, the subjects were also asked to specify how mixed color appeared as compared with the chromatic criteria by rating the seven levels of the scale using three pairs of rating phrases as follows : light-dark, deep-pale, and vivid-dull. Consequently, the subjects reported perceptive differences between the white content and the black content. 1. White was recognized to affect additive perception of whiteness, keeping the nature of primary colors intact. On the other hand, black tends to cause some effects on additive perception of blackness, changing the appearance quality of primary colors. 2. The subjects are believed to estimate the quantitative perception of each primary color on the mixed color with white as their psychological ratio. On the other hand, the quantitative perception of each primary color on the mixed color with black would be estimated independently. 3. This study has proved that white tends to affect the change of chromaticness while black works to mainly change the perceived color quality or feeling.

publication_name.en: Journal of the Color Science Association of Japan

paper_title.en: Study on the Content of White or Black Added to Red, Yelloy, Green and Blue in Color Perception

description.ja: 赤、黄、緑、青への白色量および各色への黒色量の知覚的な加法性について、回転混色法により顕色される表面色(2色混色)の心理測定実験により検討した。回転混色により顕色される表面色は、円盤上に扇形に配置された色紙の中心角により、物理的に規定される。赤、黄、緑、青の各色に、比率を変化させた白または黒を混色し、各色に対する白色量、黒色量と規定した。実験1では、各色と白、各色と黒の2色混色系列に対する色み、白み、黒みの知覚量を被験者(12名)各自の心理原色を基準に測定し、白色量、黒色量に応じて、それぞれの知覚量がどのように変化するかを調べた。実験2では、同じ被験者により、同じ2色混色系列に対する色み、白み、黒みの知覚量および2色間の知覚的な混色比率を同時呈示された物理原色を基準に測定し、原色知覚における量尺度と比率尺度との関係を調べるとともに、色原色(赤、黄、緑、青)を基準とした場合に、混色がどの程度あかるい-くらい、こい-うすい、あざやかな-くすんだかを3形容詞対の7段階評定により測定し、白、黒の知覚と色調の変化との関係を調べた。その結果、色知覚における白色量の加法性と黒色量の加法性に、いくつかの差異が認められた。1.白は、色原色の性質を保ちながら加わっていくのに対し、黒は、色調を変化させながら加わっていく傾向を示した。2.白を加えた混色系列における色み量と白み量は、量尺度においても比率尺度的な判断が行われるのに対し、黒を加えた混色系列における色み量と黒み量は、量尺度において独立に判断される傾向を示した。3.白み加法性は、知覚色における量的な変化として成り立つのに対し、黒は、色調としての知覚に影響を及ぼしながら、独立に加わっていくことから、知覚色の質的な変化に大きく関与することが示唆された。
description.en: The purpose of this study is to investigate in two experiments how we perceive the additive color mixture appearance with the white content and the black content added to either one of four primary colors : red, yellow, green, and blue, using spinning disk method. The surface colors to be developed on the spinning disk were physically controlled by the central angles of each color laid out on the fan-shaped glossy paper. Further, the white content and the black content were determined by mixing various rations of white or black with each color : red, yellow, green, and blue. To examine the variations of each color in relation to the white content or black content, the first experiment asked twelve subjects to identify the quantitative perception of each color and the white content or the black content on the mixed color as compared with psychological criteria of primary colors. Further, the second experiment examined the interrelationship between the magnitued scale and the ratio scale. So, the same subjects were asked to perform the quantitative perception and the ratio perception of each color to the white content or to the black contet on the mixed color as compared with each color and white(or black)on the both sides. In addition, the subjects were also asked to specify how mixed color appeared as compared with the chromatic criteria by rating the seven levels of the scale using three pairs of rating phrases as follows : light-dark, deep-pale, and vivid-dull. Consequently, the subjects reported perceptive differences between the white content and the black content. 1. White was recognized to affect additive perception of whiteness, keeping the nature of primary colors intact. On the other hand, black tends to cause some effects on additive perception of blackness, changing the appearance quality of primary colors. 2. The subjects are believed to estimate the quantitative perception of each primary color on the mixed color with white as their psychological ratio. On the other hand, the quantitative perception of each primary color on the mixed color with black would be estimated independently. 3. This study has proved that white tends to affect the change of chromaticness while black works to mainly change the perceived color quality or feeling.

paper_title.ja: 布の表面幾何学的構造と光の反射特性
paper_title.en: Effect of the Surface Geometry of the Fabrics on Reflection of the Light

description.ja: 本研究は布の表面幾何学的構造が光の反射特性にどのように影響を及ぼすかを明らかにすることを目的としている。構造の異なる8種の綿布(オックスフォード, ブロード, サテン, ツイル, ドリル, メリヤス)を原布とし, 反応性染料を用い, 5色, 各3水準の濃度に染色したものを試料布として実験した。布の表面反射特性を変角分光測色計, および変角光度計を用いて測定した。その結果は次のようである。1)布の表面反射率, ならびに色度は入射角を45°と固定した条件において受光角度の変化に伴って変化する。2)布のラスターは布の表面の幾何学的特性ばかりではなく, 布の測定方向によっても影響を受ける。3)布の織(編)構造による異方性は反射光強度によって推論しうる。
description.en: The purpose of this study is to investigate the relations between the geometrical surface structure of the fabrics and the optical properties in reflected light. Eight kinds of cotton fabrics, oxford1, oxford2, oxford3, satin, twill, drill and knit dyed with five different colors of reacted dye and three levels of concentration of each dye were tested. The characteristics of reflected light from the surface of the fabrics were measured using goniospectrophotometer and goniophotometer. The results were as follows: 1) The chromaticity and lightness of the fabrics change with the receiving angles at the condition of 45° of incident. 2) The luster of the fabrics should be influenced not only by the surface geometry of the fabrics but also by the fabric direction fixed on the apparatus. 3) Anisotropy of the surface of the fabrics were revealed by the reflected beam intensity.

paper_title.en: Effect of Color and Pattern On Short-term Memory

paper_title.ja: スポーツウェアにおける色彩の誘目性に関する研究 ＣＲＴ画像に対する眼球運動の解析 その１ 単色について:―CRT画像に対する眼球運動の解析 (その1, 単色について) ―
paper_title.en: A Study on the Attractiveness of Colors for Sportswear,(part1):An Analysis of Eye Movement with Mono-color Model on CRT Display

description.ja:
本研究では, CRT上に映し出されたスポーツウェアの色彩の誘目性について検討することを目的とし, CRT上のモデル画像を視覚刺激とした場合の, 眼球運動の解析を行った.
円形のカラーパッチをスポーツウェアのモデルとして用い, 芝生やアンツーカーなどの異なる背景色上に配置した視覚刺激を提示した直後, 比較的短時間の誘目性について検討した結果, 次のことが明らかとなった.
1) 初期移動方向には, 被験者間の個人差が認められ, 右方ないしは左方過剰視が表れる場合がある.
2) 第一注視点は誘目性, 視点存在率は注視性をそれぞれ表すものと考えられるが, 今回の実験時間の範囲内では, 誘目性と注視性をほぼ同等に扱うことが出来る.
3) 試験色の注視性, 誘目性に関しては, 試験色の輝度が高いほどそれらの値が高くなる.また, 背景色が誘目性に影響をおよぼし, 補色は誘目性を高め, 近似色相の背景色は誘目性を減少させる.
description.en:
The eye movements of the subjects who watched the colored circle models on a CRT (cathode ray tube) were analyzed in this paper with the aim of investigating the attractiveness of colored sportswear on a CRT display, In the experiment, leaf green, dull red, and neutral gray colors were used as background colors assuming a lawn and an en-tant-cas court.
1) The primary direction of eye-point movement varied depending on each subject and the right or the left surplus viewing was observed in some cases.
2) The primary point of stopping eye-point indicated the attractiveness, and the eye-point existence indicated the attentiveness, However, the time to present the stimulus in the experiment (1.32s) was short enough for both results to be dealt in the same way.
3) The attractiveness of the model increased in proportion to the luminance of its color. On the other hand, the background color turned out to be a great influence on the attractiveness. The complementary colors increased the attractiveness, while, however, the close hue colors decreased.

paper_title.ja: テクスチャー知覚に関する研究 : 布を例として
paper_title.en: STUDY ON THE PERCEPTION OF TEXTURE USING TEXTILE FABRICS

description.ja: The purpose of this study is to investigate the relation between the perceived texture, observed by looking at the fabrics, and their physical characteristics such as the geometrical structure of the fabric and their optical properties in reflected light. 1. Three factors of psychophysics were extracted from the sensory evaluation observed by looking at the fabrics. The first factor was texture sensitivity, the second factor was evaluation and the third factor was activity. 2. The perceived texture was much more influenced by the geometry of the fabric surface than by the surface color. 3. Texture sensitivity arising from the light stimuli of vision was measured by Scheffe's Paired Comparison Method using six pairs of adjectives. The most influence characteristic of the fabric structure on the perceived texture was revealed on the yarn thickness, the yarn count of cotton.
description.en: The purpose of this study is to investigate the relation between the perceived texture, observed by looking at the fabrics, and their physical characteristics such as the geometrical structure of the fabric and their optical properties in reflected light. 1. Three factors of psychophysics were extracted from the sensory evaluation observed by looking at the fabrics. The first factor was texture sensitivity, the second factor was evaluation and the third factor was activity. 2. The perceived texture was much more influenced by the geometry of the fabric surface than by the surface color. 3. Texture sensitivity arising from the light stimuli of vision was measured by Scheffe's Paired Comparison Method using six pairs of adjectives. The most influence characteristic of the fabric structure on the perceived texture was revealed on the yarn thickness, the yarn count of cotton.
